name: @octomind/octomind
description: a command line client for octomind apis

scripts.lint: pnpm apigen &&npx genversion -des src/version.ts && eslint src/**/*.ts tests/**/*.ts --max-warnings=0
scripts.build: pnpm apigen && npx genversion -des src/version.ts && pnpm gendoc && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.test: pnpm apigen && npx genversion -des src/version.ts && jest
scripts.test:watch: pnpm apigen && npx genversion -e src/version.ts && jest --watch
